column1: Master program in Accounting, Valuation & Financial Management
column5: The MSc program in Accounting, Valuation & Financial Management is designed to prepare students for careers such as Chief Financial Officer (CFO), management consultant, investment banker, business controller, financial analyst or auditor.As a graduate from the program, you will have a deep understanding of how financial and non-financial controls can be integrated and used for managing multinational companies from various industries, how large companies report to external share- and stakeholders and how those evaluate the financial and non-financial performance of companies in for example valuation settings.Â
